name: Back to the Future: Ep 5 - OUTATIME

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Telltale Games/Back to the Future The Game/Episode 5/BackToTheFuture105.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Humble archive
game:
  arch: win32

installer:
